thread.section_title: Dior US Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Dior US | dior-us.com
thread.title: Kimm E
thread.title_full: Dior US reviewed by Kimm E

author: Kimm E
title: Kimm E
text: I love the Dior eyeliner pencil, but wouldn't mind paying $10 bucks less by having it sent in a plain Manila padded envelope. When this huge package arrived at my door, my husband kiddingly asked me what I bought? I could only think of a recent order for an eyeliner pencil and responded back that this must be it, not really believing all this for a pencil?! inside the huge box was a large white box, complete with a beautiful bow and filled with 30 fan-folded sheets of fissue paper only to reveal one skinny eyeliner pencil inside another small box. I'm not sure I understand the importance of this extravagant presentation.???costwise for the shipping materials and for the labor of packaging it all up??
